imagePrompt: An epic, sweeping long shot in the distinctive claymation art style, depicting a melancholic ascent. 嫦娥 (Chang'e), the graceful female figure, is shown floating upwards, her flowing traditional dress billowing around her, with subtle trails of ethereal light emanating from her form.
